data.message: I have ordered two jewellery pieces over the course of past year. One was of a Platinum Band and the other was of a Tanzanite stone with diamonds ring for my wife. Both times the workmanship, design and quality was there. Mansi is very transparent regarding cost and quality of stones used.
data.name: Akshay Maheshwari

data.message: Fantastic service and stunning jewellery!, She helped with a custom design. I'm thrilled with my purchase!
data.name: Hinal Vegad

data.question: What is the minimum order value?
data.answer: There is no minimum order value. You can order any quantity of jewellery.

data.question: What is the delivery time?
data.answer: The delivery time depends on the complexity of the jewellery. For simple pieces, it can be as short as 7 days. For more complex pieces, it can take up to 30 days.

data.question: What is the return policy?
data.answer: We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you are not happy with your purchase, you can return it for a full refund within 30 days of purchase.

data.question: What payment methods do you accept?
data.answer: We accept Unified Payment Interface (UPI), all major credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal.
